transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haanji good morning. Haanji good morning.
Customer: Good morning. I am on the driving. Uh, okay. I will call you on by 3:00 o'clock or 4:00 o'clock. Or I when I go when I reach my factory, I will give you a call. I am out little bit outside.
Executive: Okay, because on Monday you give the time for the 11:30.
Customer: Yes, yes, yes, but on
Customer: due to urgent work I came to this one out outskirt.
Executive: Okay, okay. So can we connect at three? 3:00 p.m.?
Customer: Yeah, I will call you. I will as you as I reach there. I have a traveling kilometers 100 kilometers I have to travel then I will give a call.
Executive: Okay, okay. Else I will call you at three. If you are free then we can connect. Okay.
Customer: Yeah, definitely.
Executive: Okay, okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is currently driving.

- Wants to reschedule the call.



Resolution:

- Agreed to connect at 3:00 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer at 3:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:
